abstract.text: Securely support custom camera devices in macOS.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Use the Core Media I/O framework to enable support for custom camera devices in macOS. Starting in macOS 12.3, the framework builds on

to enable you to support custom devices while maintaining system privacy and security protections. The system prevents apps from loading extension code into their process to ensure that they canâ€™t bypass macOS privacy protections or mask their identity.
Apple recommends replacing legacy Device Abstraction Layer (DAL) plug-ins with Core Media I/O extensions.
